condition.narrative: No later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date (or such later date as agreed by the Association), the Recipient, throughthe MOPH, shall prepare a manual, in form and substance acceptable to the Association (“Project Implementation Manual” or “PIM”),containing, inter alia, detailed arrangements and procedures for: (i) implementation arrangements; (ii) administrative aspects;(iii) procurement; (iv) implementation of Environmental and Social Standards; (v) financial management and accounting; (vi)monitoring and evaluation; (vii) corruption and fraud mitigation measures; (viii) terms and conditions of Hazard Pay; (ix) personaldata collection and processing in accordance with applicable national law and good international practice; and (x) such othertechnical, administrative, fiduciary or coordination arrangements as may be necessary to ensure effective Project implementation

No later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date (or such later date as agreed by the Association), the Recipient, throughthe MOPH, shall: prepare and adopt a manual, in form and substance acceptable to the Association (“Project Implementation Manual”or “PIM”), containing, inter alia, detailed arrangements and procedures for: (i) implementation arrangements; (ii) administrativeaspects; (iii) procurement; (iv) implementation of Environmental and Social Standards; (v) financial management and accounting;(vi) monitoring and evaluation; (vii) corruption and fraud mitigation measures; (viii) terms and conditions of Hazard Pay; (ix)personal data collection and processing in accordance with good international practice; and (x) such other technical,administrative, fiduciary or coordination arrangements as may be necessary to ensure effective Project implementation.

No later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, prepare and adopt, a manual for the Project COVID-19 Vaccine delivery anddistribution (“Vaccine Delivery and Distribution Manual”), in form and substance satisfactory to the Association.

The Recipient shall, not later than November 30 in each calendar year during Project implementation (but not later than May 1, 2020for the first year of Project implementation), prepare and furnish to the Association for its approval, a program of Projectactivities proposed for implementation in the following calendar year.

title.narrative: Targeted regions with pandemic preparedness and response plans per Ministry of Public Health Guidelines
Radio Stations broadcast COVID-19 risk communication message
Laboratories with trained staff and consumables for collecting COVID-19 samples and transporting to National Public Health laboratory
Laboratories with trained staff and consumables for collecting COVID-19 samples and transporting to the National Public Health Llaboratory (Centre de Recherche Médicale et Sanitaire, CERMES)
Health staff trained in infection prevention per MOH-approved protocols
Personal protective equipment (PPE) kits delivered to health facilities
Targeted healthcare facilities with clinical capacity for COVID-19 patients
Suspected cases of COVID-19 cases reported and investigated based on national guidelines
Country has developed a communication and risk communication plan including community engagement strategies
Efficiency of a public health coordination mechanism for COVID-19
M&E system established and implemented to monitor project progress
Expansion of functioning cold chain equipment and stored vaccines
People trained on the installation, monitoring and maintenance of the cold chain equipment
Population vaccinated, which is included in the priority population targets defined in national plan
Gender sensitive educational materials on COVID-19 vaccines distributed
Expansion of functioning cold chain equipment and stored vaccines in urban, nomadic and desert areas- nomadic and desert areas
Doses of eligible COVID-19 vaccines delivered in-country
People trained on the installation, monitoring and maintenance of the cold chain equipment-Female
Population vaccinated, which is included in the priority population targets defined in national plan - Female
Grievances received and addressed within the defined timeframe
